mdRecord.dcterms:description: Describes march (into Pennsylvania). Reports prisoners captured, artillery and banners seized. Anticipates battle. Reports rumor that Grant captured (at Vicksburg).
There are three files available: a PDF transcription, a plain text transcription, and a PDF which was created from scans of the original document.
